overview: Dr. Teng’s research focuses on data science questions in decoding cancer epigenomic mechanisms. Epigenomics complement genomics studies in understanding cancer oncogenesis and provide new insights in cancer treatment. His data science researches, in conjunction with wet-lab collaborations, generate novel approaches to process, integrate and interpret epigenomic data toward cancer discovery.
research_interests:
Dr. Teng’s research areas include: 1) Integrative approaches in decoding enhancer functions in cancers; 2) Computational modeling of viral-tumorigenesis and immune responses in DNA virus-related cancers; 3) Machine learning in identifying clonal hematopoiesis biomarkers in solid tumors. 
  *
associations: Melanoma & Skin Cancer Center of Excellence
